```{r}
yearlyReturns_sect <- SectorPerformance %>%

    mutate(yearlyIndex =cumprod(1 + averageReturn)) %>% 
    group_by(Year) %>% 
    filter(date == last(date)) %>%

    mutate(yearlyReturn = yearlyIndex/lag(yearlyIndex) - 1) %>%

yearlyReturns_sect_df <- yearlyReturns_sect %>% 
    mutate(Year = format(date, "%Y")) %>% 
    group_by(Sector) %>% 
    mutate(Top = quantile(yearlyReturn, 0.99), Bot = quantile(yearlyReturn, 0.01)) %>% 
    mutate(Return = ifelse(yearlyReturn > Top,

    ungroup()

ZAR_returns <- ZAR %>%

    mutate(Return = value/lag(value)-1) %>%

ZAR_sd <- ZAR_returns %>% 
    mutate(Year = format(date, '%Y')) %>%
```

```{r}
    group_by(Index) %>% 
    mutate(Year= format(date, "%Y")) %>% 
    rename(Tickers = Index, Return = Returns) %>% 
    group_by(Tickers) %>% 
    mutate(Top = quantile(Return, 0.99), Bot = quantile(Return, 0.01)) %>% 
    mutate(Return = ifelse(Return > Top, Top,

perf_hi <- Perf_comparisons(ReturnsDF, Ys = Hi_Vol, Alias = "High_Vol")
perf_lo <- Perf_comparisons(ReturnsDF, Ys = Low_Vol, Alias = "Low_Vol")
```

```{r}

RebDays <- RebDays %>% 
    filter(Date_Type == 'Reb Trade Day')

calculate_capped_port <- function(dataframe, W_cap, ColName) {
    # Assuming the necessary libraries are loaded and the Proportional_Cap_Foo function is defined
    # dataframe <- rebalance_ALSI
    # W_cap <- 0.1
    Capped_df <- dataframe %>% 
        group_split(RebalanceTime) %>% 
        map_df(~Proportional_Cap_Foo(., W_Cap = W_cap)) %>% 
        select(-RebalanceTime)

    df_weights <- Capped_df %>% 
        tbl_xts(cols_to_xts = weight, spread_by = Tickers)

    df_returns <- dataframe %>% 
        filter(Tickers %in% unique(Capped_df$Tickers)) %>% 
        tbl_xts(cols_to_xts = Return, spread_by = Tickers)

    # Corrected variable names from your original code
    df_weights[is.na(df_weights)] <- 0
    df_returns[is.na(df_returns)] <- 0

    df_capped <- rmsfuns::Safe_Return.portfolio(R = df_returns, 
                                                  weights = df_weights, 
                                                  lag_weights = TRUE) %>% 
        xts_tbl()
    
    colnames(df_capped) <- c('date', ColName)

    return(df_capped)
}
```
